Literature.Title: Rationally designed ?-helical broad-spectrum antimicrobial peptides with idealized facial amphiphilicity.
Literature.Author: Wiradharma N, Sng MY, Khan M, Ong ZY, Yang YY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12222(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29737(MIC=>500µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=>500µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>500µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>500µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>500µg/ml)
